mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cust_id AS "custOff.id", so.name as "custOff.name", a.inv_title AS "invTitle", a.inv_type AS "invType", a.inv_content AS "invContent", a.inv_total AS "invTotal", a.remark AS "remarks", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", su.name as "createBy.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", su.name as "updateBy.name", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
left join sys_user su on a.create_id=su.id left join sys_office as so on a.cust_id=so.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_invoice_header( id, cust_id, inv_title, inv_type, inv_content, inv_total, remark, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{custOff.id}, #{invTitle}, #{invType}, #{invContent}, #{invTotal}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_invoice_header SET cust_id = #{custOff.id}, inv_title = #{invTitle}, inv_type = #{invType}, inv_content = #{invContent}, inv_total = #{invTotal}, remark = #{remarks}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
